add currentline to linesCollection
addPoint(float, float) - Method in class inkball.Line
Adds a new point to the line based on the given x and y coordinates.
animation - Variable in class inkball.Block
indicate whether edge tile is used for ending enimation, true means are currently used for settlement animation, false otherwise
App - Class in inkball
Game main body.
App() - Constructor for class inkball.App
Initialization of "configPath", "score_increase", "score_decrease", "balls_image", "walls_image" , "break_walls_image", "holes_image"

B

Ball - Class in inkball
a ball object, have every function a ball should have.
Ball(String, float, float) - Constructor for class inkball.Ball
constructor of ball
ballMove() - Method in class inkball.Ball
update the ball's coordinate with its velocity
balls_image - Variable in class inkball.App
balls' image collection, include 5 types of ball images.
ballsOnTheMap - Variable in class inkball.Level
balls currently on the Map
ballsQueue - Variable in class inkball.Level
balls queue for each level, spawner will use it to generate ball on map
Block - Class in inkball
represent a block, it includes wall, spawner, etc.
Block(int, int, String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class inkball.Block
Block constructor
blockType - Variable in class inkball.Block
The block could be: (1) W: wall from 0 - 4; (2) S: spawner; (3) H: hole; (4) B: initial ball spawner; (5) T: tile;
board - Static variable in class inkball.App
a 18*18 matrix which store the information of all block.
bottomLeft - Variable in class inkball.Block
bottomLeft corner point of current block, used for collision detection
bottomRight - Variable in class inkball.Block
bottomRight corner point of current block, used for collision detection
bouncy - Variable in class inkball.Block
indicate whether block is Bouncy, namely, only "W" block is bouncy
bouncyNum - Variable in class inkball.Block
indicate how many times bouncy block is hit by the corresponding ball, notice that Different colour bricks can only be damaged by the ball of corresponding colour, unless it’s a grey brick.
boundaryCollisionCheck() - Method in class inkball.Ball
check whether ball collide with boundary, it it does, change its speed and direction correctly
break_walls_image - Variable in class inkball.App
breaking walls' image collection, used when ball collide with wall.

C

CELLSIZE - Static variable in class inkball.App
cell size of each block
characters - Static variable in class inkball.Level
text file should only include below characters, all other characters will be regard as empty space
checkCollision(App) - Method in class inkball.Ball
check whether ball collide with bouncy object, namely, use boundaryCollisionCheck(), wallCollisionCheck(), and lineCollisionCheck() to implement.
checkCollisionHelper(float, float, float, float, int) - Method in class inkball.Ball
check if ball collide with a line, the difference between this one and checkLineCollisionHelper() is that we need not to consider about the thickness of line
checkEnterHole(Level, App) - Method in class inkball.Ball
check whether ball inside hole attraction cycle; if yes, then apply attraction force to the ball; if ball enter the hole, the scorer should get correspond score
checkLineCollisionHelper(float, float, float, float) - Method in class inkball.Ball
check if ball collide with a line, the difference between this one and checkCollisionHelper() is that we need to consider about the thickness of line
color - Variable in class inkball.Ball
color of ball
color - Variable in class inkball.Block
except for "T", "S" and "B", all blocks have color, namely, "T", "S" and "B" will have "colorless" color and "-1" colorIndex
colorIndex - Variable in class inkball.Ball
corresponding color idx of ball, for example, grey's color idx is 0.
colorIndex - Variable in class inkball.Block
the color index of corresponding color, for detail, refer to App.colorIndex
colors - Static variable in class inkball.App
the collection of colors for ball, hole, wall
colorsIndices - Static variable in class inkball.App
each color has a correspond number in the image files title, namely, 0-4 represent "grey", "orange", "blue", "green", "yellow" respectively; this is the arraylist of int format
colorsSIndices - Static variable in class inkball.App
each color has a correspond number in the image files title, namely, 0-4 represent "grey", "orange", "blue", "green", "yellow" respectively; this is the arraylist of string format.
configPath - Variable in class inkball.App
the path of config.json file.
currentLevel - Variable in class inkball.Level
number of current level
currentline - Variable in class inkball.Level
Indicates the line currently being drawn
currentScore - Variable in class inkball.Level
accumulated score, inherit from before levels

score decreasing modifier for each level
deleteLine() - Method in class inkball.Level
delete currentline from linesCollection
draw() - Method in class inkball.App
Draw all elements in the game of current frame according to level status.
drawBallsOnTheMap() - Method in class inkball.App
used to draw balls currently on the map
drawBallTimer() - Method in class inkball.App
used to draw Timer for ball serve, also will serve ball every spawn interval time
drawLines() - Method in class inkball.App
draw lines added or removed by player
drawMap() - Method in class inkball.App
used to draw map
drawNextFiveBalls() - Method in class inkball.App
used to draw next five balls waiting to serve on top bar if they exist.
drawScore() - Method in class inkball.App
used to draw score on top bar
drawTimer() - Method in class inkball.App
used to draw timer on top bar
drawTopBar() - Method in class inkball.App
used to draw top bar
drawWinningAnimation() - Method in class inkball.App
used to draw settlement animation

E

enterNextlevel() - Method in class inkball.Level
advance to the next level if next level exist, automatically call when satisfy wining phase.
entrypoint - Variable in class inkball.App
spawner image.

F

firstFrame - Variable in class inkball.Level
denote the first frame of each level, will change to false after the first frame happened
FPS - Static variable in class inkball.App
refresh rate of current game
frameElapsedForBallTimer - Variable in class inkball.Level
Indicate how many frame are used, will reset to 0 when balls run out, begin from 0 in each level
frameElapsedForTimer - Variable in class inkball.Level
current level, begin from 0 in each level
frameForWiningAnimation - Variable in class inkball.Level
Indicate how many frame are used when perform wining animation, will not change in other level status

H

hasNextlevel() - Method in class inkball.Level
return true if next level exist, false otherwise.
HEIGHT - Static variable in class inkball.App
height of the window
holes_image - Variable in class inkball.App
holes' image collection, include 5 types of hole images.

I

ImageBlock - Variable in class inkball.Block
H: hole only needs top left block to draw the image, so this variable will only be used for "H" block
imageBlockSize - Variable in class inkball.Block
image size of current block, "H" block should be twice larger than other block.
increaseModifier - Variable in class inkball.Level
score increasing modifier for each level
inkball - package inkball
 
isPointOnLineSegment(float, float, float, float, float, float) - Method in class inkball.Line
Checks if a given point (px, py) lies on the line segment between points (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).

K

keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class inkball.App
Receive key pressed signal from the keyboard; replay game when game end and press 'r'; replay current level whenever press 'r' except above case; pause the game whenever press " ".

L

layoutContent - Variable in class inkball.Level
store the content of txt file in the form of string of string, it is a 18*18 2-D array.
layoutFile - Variable in class inkball.Level
the name of current level's txt file
level - Static variable in class inkball.App
represent current level info.
Level - Class in inkball
Level includes everything we need for each level of game, such as map information, current score, etc.
Level(JSONArray) - Constructor for class inkball.Level
Constructor
levels - Variable in class inkball.Level
collection of all levels, read from config.json file.
levelStatus - Variable in class inkball.Level
level status: "play" means player can do anything; "pause" means player press "space"; "time's up" means player cannot do anything except press 'r' happen when time runs out; "wining" means player successfully capture all balls within time limit.
Line - Class in inkball
The Line class represents a geometric line consisting of multiple points.
Line() - Constructor for class inkball.Line
Constructor of Line
lineCollisionCheck(App) - Method in class inkball.Ball
if collide with a line, the line will be removed, and ball will bounce.
linesCollection - Variable in class inkball.Level
lines currently on the Map

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class inkball.App
run the game
mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class inkball.App
If the level.levelStatus is not "wining", when the left mouse button is clicked, the current mouse position is added to the current line object, allowing the player to draw a new line; If the right mouse button is clicked while hovering over an existing line, that line will be removed, enabling the player to erase lines.
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class inkball.App
whenever we click the left mouse, a line object is created.
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class inkball.App
if current line is not valid, such as only have 1 point, then remove it from the lines collection.

N

normalVectorHelper(float, float, float, float) - Method in class inkball.Ball
calculate the normal vector of given line which composed of point 1 and 2
NUM_COLUMNS - Static variable in class inkball.App
Indicate the number of blocks in each row
NUM_ROWS - Static variable in class inkball.App
Indicates how many rows of tiles do we have

P

pointsArray - Variable in class inkball.Line
record all points for current Line, we need to use it to draw line on App.draw()
pointsNum - Variable in class inkball.Line
the number of points that line has

R

radius - Variable in class inkball.Ball
radius of ball
random - Static variable in class inkball.App
random generator
readLayoutFile() - Method in class inkball.Level
Read txt file to get layout of current level in the form of array list of array list of string (i.e.
ready - Variable in class inkball.Ball
Indicate a ball need to move from right of loading zone to the left, each ball can be load from right to left once.
remainTime - Variable in class inkball.Level
remaining time for current level, will update when replay or enter next level, in addition, it reaches 0 will lead to === TIME’S UP ===
resetScore - Variable in class inkball.Level
Indicate the score when enter each level, used to reset score when replay current level
rightDraggedHelper() - Method in class inkball.App
If the right mouse button is clicked while hovering over an existing line, that line will be removed, enabling the player to erase lines.

S

setup() - Method in class inkball.App
Load all resources such as images; initialise the elements such as the player score and map elements; set FPS of game; read configuration from config.json; load the first level of the game.
setupBoard() - Method in class inkball.Level

spawn_interval - Variable in class inkball.Level

spawner_number - Variable in class inkball.Level

V

W

wallCollisionCheck() - Method in class inkball.Ball
if collide with a wall, the wall will break when ball's color equals wall's color or ball color is grey or ball color is grey
